summary: This is a brief email from a Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, inviting colleagues to discuss Epstein's finances. It indicates active investigation into Epstein's financial matters by the SDNY in July 2019.

persons.name: Co-Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.role: Co-Chief, Public Corruption Unit, U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, inviting colleagues to discuss Epstein's finances.

events.title: Email regarding Epstein finances
events.description: A Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the SDNY sends an email inviting colleagues to discuss Epstein's finances.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein's finances as of July 18, 2019.
The investigation involved the Public Corruption Unit of the SDNY.
The communication is an internal email invitation for a meeting or discussion about Epstein's finances.
